item.title: Audio Interview With Adam Edwards
item.description: Telarus, Inc. is considered a leading innovator in telecommunications marketing since the major telecom expansion of the 1990s. The company has transformed how businesses purchase services like T1, Ethernet, and other high-speed internet options. I recently spoke with Adam Edwards, Telarus’s president, to understand the company’s success as a top master agency. I’ve decided to share an MP3 recording of our conversation so you can hear directly from Adam instead of reading a transcript.
